{"step_by_step_thinking": "The implant assembly consists of several parts. The fixture, also known as the implant body, is the part that is surgically placed into the bone. The abutment is the part that connects the implant body to the prosthetic component. The abutment screw is used to secure the abutment to the implant body. Finally, the crown is the visible part of the tooth that is placed on top of the abutment. Therefore, the correct order is fixture, abutment, abutment screw, and crown.", "answer_choice": "A"}
